Connie Lau, a greedy grasping CEO and her ilk, on the board are doing great Don't hold your breath on dividend increase. I've owned shares since 1995 and don't remember the last dividend increase. The company is run by a very tight cabal that has grabbed off the cash by awarding themselvels shares each year. Take a look at insider transactions. None of the crooks in management have bought anything. It's all stock awards, gifts and sales. The positive news is the stock has more than quadrupled since split around 2004.. It is a good place to store money, as long as you didn't need to sell in 2007-10. Lau, the board and the Hawaiian PUS prevented the NEXTERA deal because the gravy train would end. Too bad the island is so corrupt with DEM pols. These grasping crooks would be in jail.Reply
